features.featureTitle: Add an auto-generated Invoice Number and a Date field to the bill display in App.tsx. The Invoice Number must follow the format ZWT-YYYYMMDD-XXXX (where XXXX is a random 4-digit number), generated once when the page loads or a new bill is started. The Date must display the current date formatted as DD/MM/YYYY or a human-readable equivalent. Both fields must appear prominently near the top of the bill card, above the customer name section, with labels 'Invoice No:' and 'Date:' in bold. Both fields must be included in the printed bill and in the PDF generated by the Download Bill button.
